title: Peter Landrock
summary: Peter Landrock (born August 20, 1948 in Horsens) is a Danish cryptographer and mathematician. He is known for his contributions to data encryption methods and codes.[1] Landrock has been active since the 1970s as research scientist and faculty member for Cambridge University and the University of Aarhus and others, and was active for Microsoft and Cryptomathic.[2][3] He has been visiting professor at Oxford University, Leuven University[4] and Princeton University.[5]
